author: digggts
content:
Hello, anybody here with knowledge of derivation paths who can help me with a wallet issue? My Mycelium wallet is experiencing weird behavior...  Or point me to the right person/discord? thanks
to me it looks like a security flaw

author: pipermerriam
content: <@!387322598641631232> this isn't the right place to get that kind of support.  You can try something like stack exchange....

author: digggts
content: I was trying to get a single person to look at this, because I feel posing this kind of question to a lot of people might be a bad idea if there is indeed a security issue. I'm not looking for support, rather warn others. But thanks anyway, will try stack exchange.
